1432360.name: RMaze
1432360.description:
Welcome to RMaze


RMaze is a game where you can use any weapon at your disposal to win.
You spawn in the maze and crawl into by destroying blocks to reach your opponents.
Each block may spawn an item to give you more power.
Only one player can win.

Available Features

  • Solo Game (against Artificial Intelligence)
  • Local Pvp Game (e.g. Keyboard Vs Controller)
  • Sliding, throwing a shuriken and axing your foe !
  • Random maze generator
  • Basic sounds
  • Keyboard/Mouse support
  • Steam controllers support (XBox, Playstation included)

Future Features

  • More Polishing: new sprites, new tiles, new sounds, music !
  • More fun items and new abilities.
  • Online multiplayer with dedicated servers (it's a massive amount of work, but totally worths it)
  • Endless game where you can enter and leave as you wish, party goes on forever.
  • Quality of life: proper resolution handling, sound control, key binding.
  • Level editor
  • More platforms: Steamdeck, Android, MacOS, IOs.

RMaze is still under active development.

A demo is available to have an idea of what's currently available.
Keep in mind, I'm solo indie developer and not AAA studio.
Want to support my game ?
Wishlist it, share it :)

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
